name: Egg War
description:
Defend your base and kill the enemy Eggs, better played with a controller. A strategy game with a controller? and yet, is such.
Controll the eggs to defend the core of your base, and use the coins to build additional buildings.
When the "basket plane" appear , subdivide all the eggs that you own , but don't put all your eggs in one basket!!! (eh eh eh ... that's the reference ... itsfunnycouseitstrue).
